name: QR Code Generator
author: Bijon Krishna Bairagi

sections.description:
Use this qr code wordpress plugin to create a qr code on any site of your WordPress installation. Content can be any text or the current URL of the site where it is embeded.

How to use it:

  • Use the shortcode [qr-code] within your site to generate a qr code including the URL of the current site

    • It`s not neccessary to give any parameters!

Author

Bijon Krishna Bairagi

“I create useful free microsites!”
(https://bijonkrishnabairagi.blogspot.com/” Free qr code online generator”)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip the BMS QR-Code file BMS QR-Code.zip
  2. Upload bms-qr-code to the directory /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Done
  • I am very thankful if you give me credit and a backlink to https://bijonkrishnabairagi.blogspot.com/
sections.faq:
• This plugins makes use of the Google Chart Tools https://developers.google.com/chart/
  • I am very thankful if you give me credit and a backlink to https://bijonkrishnabairagi.blogspot.com/

short_description: QR Code Wordpress plugin to insert a QR code in your blog. The qr code contains the current URL or any other text you like.
